org.dotplot.tokenizer.service
Interface ITokenStream

All Known Subinterfaces:
ITokenFilter, ITokenizer
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseScanner, BaseTokenFilter, CPlusPlusScanner, CScanner, DefaultScanner, FilteredTokenStream, GeneralTokenFilter, JavaScanner, KeyWordFilter, LineFilter, PHPScanner, PlotSourceListTokenizer, SentenceFilter, TextScanner, TokenFilterContainer
public interface ITokenStream

A tokenstream returns one token after the other, until there occure no new one. If the stream ends, the tokenstream returns onlz EOSToken.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Christian Gerhardt

Method Summary

          returns the next token from a tokenstream.
 ISourceType getStreamType()
          Returns the SourceType of this TokenStream.
